## CosHNode class

Computes the hyperbolic cosine function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class CosHNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns cosh(x) = (e^x + e^(-x)) / 2 Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
